name: Attack of the Space Kamikazes
description:
Tap Z or LMB to rotate your ship 90 degrees

Watch your Turny Fluid bar! You can't rotate when that is low!

The game may contain bugs and may have performance issues. I'm not really sure, this is my very first game,

I may add more to it depending on whether people care or not. More Endscreen messages and more powerups are likely.

Done for #onebuttonjam.

My twitter: https://twitter.com/Awkward_Artist_
